text: Larry Sharpe (born July 12, 1968) is an American business consultant, entrepreneur, and political activist. He was born in Manhattan. He was a candidate for the Libertarian Party nomination for Vice President of the United States in 2016. He is founder and Managing Director at NeoSage.Doherty, Brian On July 12, 2017, he announced his candidacy for Governor of New York for the 2018 election. On April 13, 2020 it was announced that Sharpe would again seek the Libertarian Party's nomination for Vice President in the 2020 election, as the running mate of 2012 Libertarian vice-presidential nominee Judge Jim Gray. ==References== ==Other websites== * Gubernatorial campaign website Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:American political activists Category:Politicians from New York City Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:Libertarian Party (United States) politicians Category:2020 United States vice-presidential candidates Category:2016 United States vice-presidential candidates
title: Larry Sharpe (politician)
